content: Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum. However, you can change the role of individual users in the group after it has been successfully added.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when adding a group to a room, indicating that users can change individual roles in the group after it's been added successfully. The warning informs users about role changes allowed after initial group addition. It appears in the Invite Panel component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Bununla belə, qrup uğurla əlavə edildikdən sonra qrupdakı fərdi istifadəçilərin rolunu dəyişə bilərsiniz" is slightly awkward. The verb 'dəyişə bilərsiniz' should agree with the subject. It should be 'dəyişə bilərsiniz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bununla belə, qrup uğurla əlavə edildikdən sonra qrupdakı fərdi istifadəçilərin rolunu dəyişə bilər.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum' is not perfectly reflected in the Czech translation.  The Czech phrasing 'Skupiny lze do místnosti přidat maximálně s rolí {{roleName}}' is a bit clunky and could be improved to flow better. A more natural Czech phrasing might be 'Do místnosti lze přidat skupiny s maximální rolí {{roleName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Do místnosti lze přidat skupiny s maximální rolí {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Gruppen können maximal mit der Rolle {{roleName}} zum Raum hinzugefügt werden" is awkward and doesn't flow naturally in German. A more natural phrasing would be "Gruppen können bis zur Rolle {{roleName}} zu einem Raum hinzugefügt werden" or "Gruppen können mit der Rolle bis zu {{roleName}} zu einem Raum hinzugefügt werden".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gruppen können bis zur Rolle {{roleName}} zu einem Raum hinzugefügt werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'zu' needs a 'm' after it to indicate dative case. The use of 'zu einem Raum' is technically correct, but 'zu einem' makes the sentence more clunky than necessary. 'In einen Raum' could also be correct depending on context but likely isn't what's intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gruppen können bis zur Rolle {{roleName}} in einen Raum hinzugefügt werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'can change' (puede cambiar) implies a general ability. The English emphasizes the *user's* ability to change the role, not just anyone.  It's missing the specificity of the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puede modificar el rol de los usuarios individuales en el grupo una vez que se haya añadido correctamente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Maksimimäärän ryhmiä voi nyt lisätä huoneeseen" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Groups can be added to a room". A more natural phrasing would be something like "Ryhmiä voi lisätä huoneeseen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ryhmiä voi lisätä huoneeseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "nyt" (now) in "Maksimimäärän ryhmiä voi nyt lisätä huoneeseen" is unnecessary and slightly awkward in this context. It doesn't add any meaning and makes the sentence less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'nyt'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'as maximum'. While it technically works, it lacks the implied limitation that the role is the highest permitted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to better convey the 'maximum' aspect, perhaps by adding context. Something like 'Ryhmiä voi lisätä huoneeseen vain {{roleName}}-roolilla' (Groups can be added to a room only with the {{roleName}} role).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "comme maximum" is a bit awkward and not the most natural way to express "as maximum" in French. It's technically correct but sounds clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les groupes peuvent être ajoutés à une salle avec le rôle {{roleName}} maximum.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "une fois que celui-ci a été ajouté avec succès" is slightly verbose and could be simplified. 'celui-ci' refers to the group, and while understandable, there's a more concise way to say it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: une fois que le groupe a été ajouté avec succès.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure in the Armenian translation is a bit awkward and could be improved for better flow. Specifically, the phrase "դերն է" sounds unnatural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խմբերը կարող են ավելացվել սենյակում, որտեղ կարող են լինել {{roleName}} դեր ունեցողներ։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'դերն է' doesn't directly translate the meaning of 'maximum'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggestion in the previous point addresses this, but to be more specific: consider using something like 'առավելագույնը {{roleName}} դեր ունեցողներ' or 'առավելագույնը {{roleName}} դերի մարդիկ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double space after the colon in the second sentence is a formatting issue.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the extra space after the colon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "役割を最大として" (yakuwari o saidai to shite) is a slightly unnatural way to express "as maximum". A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of "最大で{{roleName}}の役割まで" (saidai de {{roleName}} no yakuwari made).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: グループは最大で{{roleName}}の役割まで、ルームに追加することができます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The punctuation mark after '役割' in "役割を最大として" could be improved. Using a period would make the sentence flow better, although the suggested correction above rephrases the sentence for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: グループは{{roleName}}役割を最大としてルームに追加することができます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "최대 {{roleName}} 역할로 룸에 그룹을 추가할 수 있습니다" translates literally to 'You can add groups to a room with a maximum of {{roleName}} role.' This could be interpreted as the *room* having a limit based on the user's role, which is not the intended meaning. The intended meaning is the *group* can only be added to a room if its role is at or below {{roleName}}.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 최대 {{roleName}} 역할 이하의 그룹만 룸에 추가할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly awkward in Korean. While grammatically correct, it could be made more fluid.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 룸에 그룹을 추가할 때, 최대 {{roleName}} 역할 이하의 그룹만 추가할 수 있습니다. 하지만 그룹을 추가한 후에는 개별 사용자의 역할을 변경할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a direct transliteration of 'roleName'. Consider localizing it with a more natural phrasing if possible. While technically correct, it might feel awkward for Lao speakers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing '{{roleName}}' to something like 'ຖານະຜູ້ໃຊ້' or a similar phrase that is commonly used in Lao for 'role' depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'lietotāju' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'lietotāji'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: lietotāji

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'Groepen kunnen aan een kamer worden toegevoegd met de {{roleName}} rol als maximum' is a bit clunky in Dutch. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally. A more natural phrasing would be 'Groepen kunnen aan een kamer worden toegevoegd, waarbij de {{roleName}} rol het maximum is.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Groepen kunnen aan een kamer worden toegevoegd, waarbij de {{roleName}} rol het maximum is.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original sentence 'However, you can change the role of individual users in the group after it has been successfully added' translates to 'U kunt echter de rol van individuele gebruikers in de groep wijzigen nadat deze met succes is toegevoegd'. 'Deze' refers to 'groep' (group), but it is clearer to refer to the 'room' instead. This is because the previous sentence already established that we're talking about adding groups *to a room*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: U kunt echter de rol van individuele gebruikers in de groep wijzigen nadat de kamer succesvol is toegevoegd.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Grupy mogą zostać dodane do pokoju z maksymalną rolą {{roleName}}." could be improved for flow. The passive voice "mogą zostać dodane" is grammatically correct but sounds less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupy można dodać do pokoju z maksymalną rolą {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Grupuri pot fi adăugate la o sală cu un rol maxim {{roleName}}" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be something like "Grupuri pot fi adăugate într-o sală cu rolul maxim {{roleName}}" or "În camera se pot adăuga grupuri cu rolul maxim {{roleName}}"
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupuri pot fi adăugate într-o sală cu rolul maxim {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence "Cu toate acestea, puteți modifica rolul pentru utilizatori din grup în mod individual odată ce grupul a fost adăugat cu succes." is a bit long and could be improved for readability. Using a simpler structure would enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cu toate acestea, puteți modifica rolul utilizatorilor individual, după ce grupul a fost adăugat cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation uses a period after "{{roleName}" which is not present in the English content. This creates a slight difference in sentence structure and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the period after "{{roleName}}".  The phrase should read: "Группы можно добавлять в комнату с максимальной ролью {{roleName}}."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "භූමිකාව සහිතව උපරිම වශයෙන්" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation of "with the {{roleName}} role as maximum" would be something like "{{roleName}} භූමිකාව දක්වා උපරිම වශයෙන්" or "{{roleName}} භූමිකාවෙන් උපරිම වශයෙන්".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලක කණ්ඩායම් {{roleName}} භූමිකාවෙන් උපරිම වශයෙන් කාමරයකට එකතු කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "කණ්ඩායම සාර්ථකව එකතු වූ පසු" is a literal translation of 'after the group has been successfully added'. It sounds a little clunky in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing might be 'කණ්ඩායම එකතු කිරීම සාර්ථක වීමෙන් පසුව'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලක කණ්ඩායම් {{roleName}} භූමිකාවෙන් උපරිම වශයෙන් කාමරයකට එකතු කළ හැකිය. කෙසේ වෙතත්, කණ්ඩායම එකතු කිරීම සාර්ථක වීමෙන් පසුව තනි පරිශීලකයින්ගේ භූමිකාව වෙනස් කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation "maximálnou rolou" is a literal translation of 'maximum role' but sounds awkward in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would be 'rolou {{roleName}} ako maximálnou'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupiny je možné pridať do miestnosti s rolou {{roleName}} ako maximálnou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'v skupine' (in the group) is redundant. It's already clear that the user roles are being discussed within the context of the group.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po úspešnom pridaní skupiny však môžete zmeniť rolu jednotlivých používateľov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Skupine se lahko dodaja v sobo z najvišjo vlogo {{roleName}}." is grammatically awkward. It implies that groups themselves are being added 'in' a room. A more natural phrasing would be "Skupine se lahko dodajajo v sobo..." or "Mogoče je dodajanje skupin v sobo..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupine se lahko dodajajo v sobo z najvišjo vlogo {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'najvišjo vlogo' (highest role) might be misinterpreted. It could be more accurate to express the limit of roles available, not necessarily the 'highest' one.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupine se lahko dodajajo v sobo z vlogo {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's an unnecessary space before the comma after 'Међутим'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Међутим, можете променити улогу појединачних корисника у групи након успешног додавања.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses passive voice ('Grupe se mogu dodati...') which can sound awkward in this context. A more active voice would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupe mogu biti dodate u prostoriju sa {{roleName}} ulogom kao maksimum.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kao maksimum' is slightly clunky. A more natural phrasing would be to simply state the maximum role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupe mogu biti dodate u prostoriju sa {{roleName}} ulogom. Međutim, možete promeniti ulogu pojedinačnih korisnika u grupi nakon uspešnog dodavanja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "з максимальною роллю" (with maximum role) isn't the most natural way to express the intended meaning. It sounds slightly awkward in Ukrainian. A better phrasing would indicate the maximum allowable role when adding groups.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: з максимально дозволеною роллю

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'її' (its/her/their) refers to 'group'. While technically correct, it's slightly ambiguous. Rewording for more clarity is advisable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: після успішного додавання групи

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "với vai trò {{roleName}} là tối đa" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "với vai trò tối đa là {{roleName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: với vai trò tối đa là {{roleName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "最大角色为{{roleName}}" is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Chinese. It would be more natural to say something like "最高权限角色为{{roleName}}" or "允许的最大权限为{{roleName}} 的角色".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以将群组添加到房间，允许的最大权限为{{roleName}} 的角色。或者：可以将群组添加到房间，最高权限角色为{{roleName}}。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of punctuation might improve readability. Adding a pause before and after the role name insertion is recommended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以将群组添加到房间，允许的最大权限为{{roleName}} 的角色。或者：可以将群组添加到房间，最高权限角色为{{roleName}}。
